# Antony Benny - SEO Expert in Kerala

> Professional SEO services for businesses in India and USA

## About

Antony Benny is an SEO Expert based in Thrissur, Kerala, India. Specializing in helping businesses rank higher on Google through proven SEO strategies including Technical SEO, On-Page SEO, Off-Page SEO, Local SEO, and Content Strategy.

## Services

- Technical SEO (site audits, speed optimization, schema markup)
- On-Page SEO (keyword research, content optimization, meta tags)
- Off-Page SEO (link building, guest posting)
- Local SEO (Google My Business optimization, local citations)
- Content Strategy
- Analytics & Reporting
